Headline: The fabulous attractions of Miami
Article_Body: Miami, Florida: The city synonymous with style, sex and surf is never a bad place to visit.  Brickell City Centre: Pack an empty suitcase if you're heading to this collection of glossy boutiques. Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum of Science: This relative newbie to the museum scene is perfect for the kids. Perez Art Museum Miami: Known locally as PAMM, this museum celebrates Latin American and Caribbean artists. The EDITION South Beach: Besides a nightclub, look for a bowling alley and indoor skating rink.  Delano South Beach: In South Beach, the Delano hotel aces the day-drinking pool party scene. The Four Seasons Surf Club: Famed chef Thomas Keller has a restaurant at The Four Seasons Surf Club.
